Name: Little Collins
Review Text: You cannot go wrong with food at Little Collins. Whoever is designing their menu - and making the food - is ace at combining flavours in wonderful ways. I always look forward to trying their new dishes

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Super nice place for lunch. Extraordinary menu with lots of smoked, pickled and fresh ingredients. The dishes are delicious, but pretty small and not too cheap. But it's worth it!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Amazing food! Good flavors and seasoned very well!! It was an amazing lunch!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text:
Delicious, Savory Brunch

If you‚Äôve got a sweet tooth and like options this may not be the place for you. ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Fresh flavours and ingredients, recently expanded their brunch menu with new offerings!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: The food is always spectacular‚Äìtheir menus change frequently and are so inventive and delicious. We went for a company brunch and Kelle and the rest of the staff took amazing care of us, and were even great with our youngest guest (a toddler of 2 years!) Cannot recommend enough.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text:
Michelin-star quality in a humble setting!
Every dish we ordered was packed with exquisite flavors.. from the bread to the brisket. The deserts on the other hand missed the mark somehow. A special mention to probably the cutest & lovely staff we‚Äôve come across in Amsterdam!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text:
Amazing menu with surprising combinations of really good quality products.
The sourdough bread with butter is insanely good.
The vibe is okay, they could play some music. ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Had a really lovely dinner here. The server was great. She had some awesome recommendations and even had some great cocktail recipes up her sleeve.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Super delish lunch! Humble yet sophisticated menu, full of stimulating flavors. Great vegetables and super friendly service in a relax atmosphere. Looking forward to eat again some ‚Äúspiced pumpkin fritters‚Äù YUM Great relax fine dining.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: I wanted to try this and luckily we got a table after a trip to the park. Interesting menu. The latte was quite tasty (small but good). The grilled halloumi with guacamole, black beans (mashed), pickled onions, and corn tortillas was spicy ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Such a great place to have a brunch in Amsterdam. The service was really good and the food is super tasty üòã. Well done guys !

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great food, very friendly staff.. it was a bit busy so it took a bit longer for our food. We were told the dishes are a bit bigger than a usual starter, we didn't really have that idea, the food was rather small in our opinions. We did try ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text:
super cool menu, nice reinterpretations of classic dishes. Good cocktails, good prices...
i would implement the indoor ventilation. After brunch you need a shower to loose the food smell.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great stuff. The team was very friendly from the get-go and got us a spot at the bar - on a Sunday morning, when it was fully booked. Food was great as per usual (Omelette with 'nduja and brisket flat bread this time). Efficient service and great vibes. Biceps emoji!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Super delicious food! Full of flavor! They recommend 3 or 4 dishes to share between 2 people, and I think if you are really hungry, it's the right amount of food. We were not that hungry so we took 2 and the bread and it was enough! Totally recommend this place!!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: If you love a good hearty brunch but want something else then eggs benedict, go to this place! The music is a bit loud for my taste, but my oh my those dishes! Its a shared dining concept so one dish wouldnt be enough per person. For two ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Food is very flavourful but portions are smaller and made to share making it an expensive brekkie (for two people, 3-4 dishes were recommended). ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Don‚Äôt really get the idea of small plates or portions for a brunch place, people want to have a nice full meal for brunch. Even though we had a reservation they kicked us out after 90 mins. 3 stars only for food. 0 stars for service and concept.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great location with really good Food. Would come back for sure. Can recommend to anyone

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Sensational small plates with a bias toward middle eastern flavors and fermented ingredients. Wonderful, relaxed service. One of the best meals to be had in Amsterdam right now.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Nice brunch place. The food was nice and tasty but it felt quite pricey as the portions were a bit small. I strongly recommend their bread and miso butter as were delicious.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: There is definitely creativity in the way the food is prepared here. Lots of experimentation with different flavors. But some combinations just didn‚Äôt do it for me. Smoked burrata in combinations with peppers and carrots in spicy tomato ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great menu with really surprising food combinations. Lovely and friendly staff. Also seats outside to enjoy the sun and perfect spot for people watching. Definitely will be back!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Cappucino was ok but a bit burnt, not so good. Had a great dish with spicy butter and sucuk sausage, a tad oily though. My friend ordered the guacamole beans halloumi which was overcooked and way too salty. Good kimchi bloody mary though and friendly service.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: The food at little collins is a real delight. The team does a stellar job at combining flavours in a unique way while rejecting traditional notions of regional cuisines. They mesh traditions from all around the world to form something ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Absolutely incredible Melbourne-style brunch! Coffee is on point and a creative menu (highly reccomend the Cilbir). 10/10 would go again!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Really nice. 10 stars for the service! And the food was great

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Delicious food. I had the pumpkin waffle! Maple butter was to die for! Coffee is great and service is good. It's new.. so I do hope they will make the interior a bit warmer (no photos of that unfortunately).

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Absolutely incredible Melbourne-style brunch! Coffee is on point and a creative menu (highly reccomend the Cilbir). 10/10 would go again!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Nice location, but the staff needs to be more careful with the customers

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great menu with really surprising food combinations. Lovely and friendly staff. Also seats outside to enjoy the sun and perfect spot for people watching. Definitely will be back!

Name: Little Collins

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great service and delicious food. We've been so excited to get back to Little Collins now they are open again. The food is always great and the staff are always so friendly. Highly recommend if you fancy a meal a bit more out there than your standard brunch!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Funky little place, nice vibe, great drinks and good food. Some dishes seem to be a bit 'trying-to-hard' to be hip but they are yummy anyways.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Delicious food. I had the pumpkin waffle! Maple butter was to die for! Coffee is great and service is good. It's new.. so I do hope they will make the interior a bit warmer (no photos of that unfortunately).

Name: Little Collins

Review Text: One of my favourite brunch spots in Amsterdam. Not only are the food and coffee delicious, but the service is super friendly and attentive. Special shout outs to whoever is on music duty, because the tunes are always great.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Bland bread... I had the French toast, it was a big portion but it had no egg soaked into it and No sugar. It was a big wedge of sourdough bread 8cm cubed. As there was no sweetness, the other flavours were wasted, the figs were just soft ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Delicious brunch and it was really lovely to have such warm and welcoming customer service. Staff were attentive and it really adds to your experience. We had the pastrami waffle and a dish with poached eggs, ricotta and sausage. Epic food!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Always amazing coffee and great service. Well priced food, a must do for Amsterdam!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Little Collins West is as great as the one in de Pijp. Not disappointed and always good time there with excellent food and vibes. Staffs couldn‚Äôt be more friendly.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Little Collins doesn't just serve up one of the best brunch options in Amsterdam, its evening menu is also very exciting. All plates are set up to share with a group of friends, or dining as a couple. One starter and three main dishes as recommend by the staff was plenty! Try the pumpkin fritters, and stewed goat. Lekker!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text:
Amazing food and super friendly staff!

Name: Little Collins

Name: Little Collins
Review Text:
Probably my favourite place in Amsterdam. Awesome food and flavours with unusual combinations that keep your taste buds dancing! Yeah, I like it.
Super friendly staff, cosy atmosphere. Highly recommended this place for any time of the day!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Oh my god - wow. I was truly floored by the exceptional cuisine. The food was absolutely mouthwatering and delicious. I expected a good meal, and I got an exceptional one. I highly, highly recommend this place as one of the best brunches I've ever had in my life.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Don't order the "Kimchi Toast"...  It was really bad, we ordered it and returned immediately. Couple next to us also ordered and couldn't eat it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Casual seating but extraordinary tasty balanced dishes. Nice service. Berlin vibes.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Highly recommended. Share. Try everything.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Their food is delicious. It has an oriental accent in some of the dishes which I find as a big plus. Very nice and fast service, they know what they are serving. One of my favourite places in Amsterdam

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: very good brunch! the sourdough is perfect. overall it may be a little overpriced, but the lovely service had me coming back three days in a row :)

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great Aussie-style (the best!) cafe with interesting brunch options. Much bigger than their De Pijp location and different menu. Several gluten-free, vegan and veggie options, including gluten-free bread (1.50 extra) and dairy-free milk options. Can book (for now) too!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: First off, service was great! I can‚Äôt say the same for the food though. I ordered the Guasaca for 13 euros. What a disappointment. It was basically a spoonful of guacamole, black beans, 3 corn tortillas, and a tiny few bits of onion/parsley ‚Ä¶

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great variety of very special dishes with clear middle eastern flavors. Service was great, albeit a bit slow due to the places obvious popularity. Only downside was mediocre coffee :)

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Brunch was great, menu has options for everyone. Went for the Kimchi & Gruyere pocket with bacon on top. Was super tasty! This great brunch place is a welcome addition to the neighborhood. Place was packed, so make sure to reserve!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Very tasty and inspired brunch dishes!

Name: Little Collins

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Such a delightfully delicious place. More spacious than the de pijp location and more formal as well. Sensational food for a great price. All the workers and staff are incredibly lovely! A gem in Amsterdam

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great place for brunch/ lunch. They change their menu frequently but it‚Äôs always well thought and delicious. The stuff is also very helpful and polite

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Tonight my wife and I walked by and were curious what was new. We had a great meal with wonderul flavours and healthy ingredi√´nts. We shared the various dishes and were positively surprised! Not just by te food, but also by the super friendly and welcoming staff. Highly recommended and we will definately return!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great coffee, great (and unique) food, friendly service (lots of Aussies, so makes sense *wink*). Love having a little taste of Melbourne life while living in my home away from home that is Amsterdam. High recommend. Check out the uber cool Oud West neighbourhood while you're around the place.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Awesome espresso. Interesting and delicious food options.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Great food and excellent service, fresh juices are top notch. On a Sunday visit we had to wait for about 20 minutes to get a table but it was definitely worth a little wait. I am going to try out Little Collins De Pijp next.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: One of the best breakfast / lunch bars to eat in Amsterdam is now also in the West! The food is  just fantastic and you will have a hard time picking just 1 meal from the menu.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Very expensive for nothing crazy ‚Ä¶ very small portion and rustic decoration !!

Name: Little Collins

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Every dish on the menu tastes delicious and is very special. However i find the portions a bit too small. i was not full afterwards and i usually dont eat that much.

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Absolutely perfect. Starting with the friendly service, good background music, delicious food and re a lly good coffee. I will defiantly come back soon. By The way: I had the pumpkin waffle, and it's to die for.

Review Text: Super super tasty! Get the Panacotta yogurt & granola if you want something small & sweet, go for the Kimchi Pancake or Curried eggs if you want something bigger & savoury. Both were DELISH! Will definitely go back!

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: The halloumi cheese in the Guasacaca is absolutely delicious, and so is the brownie. Definitely a place to go if you want to have an awesome brunch! (and you can book a table even in the week-ends)

Name: Little Collins

Review Text: A graceful space! The food is expertly prepared by a well-seasoned kitchen, and a deliberate, ebullient waitstaff delivers the goods. Thank you for your hospitality. Delicious!

Review Text: I'm very happy Little Collins opened close to my place! I've been here already twice since the opening, nice space, welcoming staff and great food. Specially enjoyed the blody mary selection for the Sunday hungover brunch :D

Name: Little Collins
Review Text: Lovely and friendly service. The food is very good. Ask the cocktail specialist to create you favourite cocktail. I can suggest the Daiquiri cocktail, it is of the menu ;)
